title: Perma Banned
body:
Greetings Fellow Summoner,
I was in-game last week (Friday) playing as Pyke (I had just bought him) when I get a popup ad and I tried to close it but I must have miss clicked as it took me out of the game and then the website instantly closed I thought nothing of it and continued to play but then after coming back from a day out I tried to play League and discovered I had been Perma-Banned!!!!!!! But anyway I was wondering if you could unban me please

> [{quoted}](name=Th3Gr8pist,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ef04FE2c,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-06-13T17:39:58.512+0000)Because a player triggered review found your in-game comms extremely inflammatory and offensive, your account has been permanently suspended.

Ahh. That was my fear. There are some bans that are protective bans (if they feel someone has gotten access to your account, for example), and those can indeed be lifted. Behavioral bans, however, are only ever lifted if they are improperly applied.

> Th3Gr8pist: Nice Try %%%s
> Th3Gr8pist: Stpo being a %%%
> Th3Gr8pist: I was refering to cigarettes idiot

This term is considered hate speech, which Riot has a zero-tolerance policy against. While you claim to be referring to cigarettes, I'm afraid that's a claim that holds no water with Riot -- the use of that word to refer to people simply isn't acceptable, and if you wished to call them cigarettes as an insult for some reason you should have used the word cigarette instead of a word more strongly associated with homophobic hate speech, *especially* when used as an insulting term towards someone.

Unfortunately, I must tell you that the account is unrecoverable due to this behavior. This is not a ban Riot would consider overturning under any circumstances.

>Also thank you, you have already been 10 times more helpful than Riot Support.

I try. I'm sorry I can't give you news more to your satisfaction.
But I didn't do anything please I just want to play the game I have spent so much time, money and effort please just let me play the game

Unfortunately you did indeed do something -- you used hate speech in *League*, and it's clear you intended it as an insult, so the "I meant cigarettes" argument isn't especially convincing. I'm not able to suggest any course of action that would result in an unban, because I know for a fact that Riot will *not* roll back a ban on chat logs with this sort of behavior in them.

Unfortunately, this is also one of those instances where Riot has more knowledge than I do. They can track IPs and physical locations that access their servers, in-game choices and playstyles unique to individual players, etc. They have a *very* high accuracy at detecting when an account is being played on by someone other than the owner, and I'm afraid that if they have dismissed the idea of the account being compromised I'm inclined to trust their data.

All I can say is that if you told Riot you were hacked, they would have looked through their data to see if the connection information and gameplay habits from the game in question matched your typical connection and playstyle. If they upheld the ban, then it's probably because they could not confirm the account was compromised, and it appeared to them that the games were yours.

You'd have to ask Player Support for more specific details, if they're able to provide them.
